overview: What happens when a 700 year old Jester is released from his prison and needs a bride to populate the earth with demon spawn? Well, a whole lot of fun! Jester is one scary movie starring Rich Evans as a demonic Jester that likes bad jokes and beating people with stereos. Watch as this maniac slices and dices his way through a cast of sub-par actors and lamely writen scenes! And always remember, never hit Jester in his groin!
title: Jester
